doc.title: Paws & Tales, the Animated Series: A Closer Look
doc.plot: The gang from Wildwood is back, and this time there is a mystery that the whole family is sure to enjoy! Staci is convinced that she doesn't do anything well. After all, she can't paint amazing pictures like Gooz or spell nearly as well as Ned. But when a mysterious gift is left on her doorstep, Staci must use all of her skills to crack the case and reveal the gift-giver. It's a clue-solving adventure that will send Staci and her pals to the edge of Wildwood and back again!
